papers.description: Report-writing assessment on electricity usage in New Zealand, analyzing statistical graphs and making interpretations. This format was DISCONTINUED after 2023.
papers.pilot_year_notes: This was the pilot version. For 2024 onwards, this standard was completely changed to 'Use algebraic methods to solve problems' with traditional algebra questions instead of report writing.
topics_covered: Critical evaluation of claims from data
papers.instructions: Check that this sheet is printed on both sides. You are to compose a report on electricity usage in New Zealand. Your report will be divided into two parts.

section_a.title: HOME Electricity Usage
tasks: Compare electricity prices for Homes vs Businesses (1990-2022)
Evaluate news claims about power price increases
Analyze household electricity expenditure and usage data
Advise on choosing electricity companies (with assumptions/limitations)

section_b.title: Electricity Generation and the Environment
tasks: Identify which generation method has most environmental impact
Evaluate NZ's progress toward 100% renewable energy by 2030
Propose government solutions for Zero Carbon Emissions by 2050

resources_provided: Resource 4-6: Generation methods and environmental impact data
